name: Save the crew!
description:
In this game you are an astronaut trying to get oxygen for you and your crew.

You have to click and jump. Simple.

I made this game in order to improve my programming skills, fot the challenge and the fun.

It is not a super complex game, nevertheless, I enjoyed doing it and had to explore some new concepts.

I am much more interested in the coding part so full disclaimer, None of the images were done by me, you can find the links below:

Tiles

Oxygen

Astronaut

Captain
